data.title: Fantastic Spa!!!
data.text:
Best experience ever at Mezz Spa!
We were gifted the couples retreat package, the facial done by Alyssa was amazing and the massages were exactly what we needed after a long trip.
The staff were professional, friendly and greeted us with hot Aveda tea. The spa is chic, and tastefully decorated. Little gem in the heart of downtown Alpharetta. Highly recommend it to anyone in that area!
